body.content:
Iraq has the world's second largest proven oil reserves and is
extraordinarily cheap to produce. As the Manager Drilling & Completion of
Iraq NORTH OIL COMPANY I'm able to secure extra barrels of light crude oil
from an isolated oil well in Kirkuk with a producing capacity of 100,000
barrels per day (bpd) through the same source Iraq's North Oil Company
produces theirs. Iraq's major oil production fields have been taken over by
some foreign multinationals such as Shell, BP, Exxon Mobil, Chevron and
Total due to it's need to raise its oil daily production to 6 million
barrels per day. Stipulating how foreign investment will be governed is
also critical amid concerns that Iraqi oil revenues have been squeezed by
these large oil firms granted special treatment with the help of the US
government.

This has led to the Iraq government (Parliament) to enact a new law to
improve local content by allowing its citizenry to partner with individuals
who win contracts and must take on a local partnership that in turn must
have a minimum 25% stake in the deal. Individual Foreign Contractors can
set up Local Companies in Iraq with a local partner who in turn must have
25% stake in the company to explore some of the scattered isolated Oil
wells.

Origin:……………….KirKuk-Iraq
Quantity:…………….100,000 Barrels Per Day for 3 Months.
Contract period:…......3 Months.
Delivery: …………....Turkish Export Terminal of Ceyhan.
Price:..……………… As Agreed in Contract

I will prepare all the relevant Documents to Register a Local Company here
in your Name as required by the laws of the land with the help of Legal
Experts, but it will be stated in the documents that I actually own 10%
stake in the company, as this is the only means we can export the crude oil
from Iraq. You will be required to open/setup and manage an offshore
account in your Name in a Bank in one of the top Oil Producing Countries
for smooth transfer of the Oil proceeds(funds). This account is where the
eventual buyer(s) of this crude oil will transfer all payments to.Also an
MOU(Memorandum of Understanding) will be signed between you and I to ensure
that both parties keep to the terms of agreement. I will be responsible for
the exportation of these barrels and the expenses involved.

Once the barrels have been exported and sold we shall share the proceeds in
the ratio of 80% for me considering the fact that we are the
originators/initiators and initial financier of this partnership business
and then 20% for you. I will instruct my legal team to commence the paper
work as soon as I get the Foreign Company Registration Form from the
Ministry of Trade process by the Oil Ministry once you indicate your
final/total interest by confirming/providing me with the following
information required.

Names-
Home Address-
City-
State
Country
Phone Number--
Occupation-
Age-

I will appreciate your immediate response and also indicate if you wish to
proceed with the contract partnership.

Sincerely,
Brad Wallwork
Manager,Drilling & Completion
North Oil Company
